metadata.title: Elite Power Development & Tennis Agility

instructions: Deep breathing with explosive movement visualization
Mental preparation for high-intensity power training

implementation.execution: Seated position with explosive movement imagery
implementation.focus: Nervous system preparation for power demands
implementation.tennis_application: Prepares mind for explosive tennis movements
Prepares for explosive tennis and strength training

tennis_training.title: Tennis Agility & Transition Training
tennis_training.description: High-intensity tennis agility with aggressive transitions

phases.name: Progressive Speed Building
detailed_instructions: Light court movement building speed: 20 steps each direction
Progressive shadow strokes with speed: 20 each stroke
Speed emphasis throughout warm-up

phases.name: Explosive Movement Preparation
detailed_instructions: Quick direction changes: 15 each direction
Explosive first step practice: 20 repetitions
Speed and agility preparation

phases.name: High-Intensity Transitions
detailed_instructions: Aggressive transitions between shots: maximum effort
Quick lateral movements with recovery: 30 repetitions
Explosive first steps with balance maintenance

phases.name: Complex Transition Patterns
detailed_instructions: Multi-directional transition drills: 20 patterns
Reactive transition practice with visual cues
Competitive intensity movement patterns

phases.name: Lateral Speed Development
detailed_instructions: Lateral shuffles at maximum speed: 25 each direction
Crossover steps with acceleration: 20 each direction
Push off outside foot with power emphasis

phases.name: Agility Pattern Integration
detailed_instructions: Agility ladder patterns at maximum speed
Cone weaving with explosive changes
Maintain low center of gravity throughout

phases.name: Strength Training Preparation
detailed_instructions: Gentle movement with power focus
Mental transition to explosive strength training
Hydration and brief recovery

exercises.name: Dynamic Hip Activation
exercises.tennis_application: Prepares hips for deadlifts and hip thrusts

exercises.name: Shoulder Power Preparation
exercises.tennis_application: Prepares shoulders for push press and overhead work

exercises.name: Core Power Activation
exercises.tennis_application: Prepares core for med ball slams and power movements

exercises.name: Grip and Forearm Preparation
exercises.tennis_application: Prepares for farmer's carries and grip demands

strength_training.title: Explosive Strength Development
strength_training.description: Heavy explosive movements with Week 2 progressive overload

main_exercises.name: Trap-bar Deadlift
main_exercises.tennis_application: Posterior chain power for court movement and jumping

technique_points.instruction: 5-10% load increase from Week 1, maintain explosive intent
Stand inside trap bar, feet hip-width apart, neutral spine
Hip hinge with neutral spine, chest up, lats engaged
Drive through heels and hips explosively, maximum power
Control descent slowly for time under tension
Brief pause between reps to maintain quality
Power output with perfect form, no compromise

main_exercises.name: Hip Thrusts
main_exercises.tennis_application: Hip power for serve and groundstroke generation

technique_points.instruction: Shoulders on bench, feet flat, bar on hip crease
Core engaged before lift, glutes pre-tensioned
Explosive hip drive, squeeze glutes hard at top
Create straight line from knees to shoulders
Lower slowly over 2 seconds, maintain tension
Maximum power on concentric, controlled eccentric
Exhale forcefully during drive phase

main_exercises.name: Push Press
main_exercises.protocol: Explosive leg drive to overhead press
main_exercises.tennis_application: Overhead power for serves and high volleys

technique_points.instruction: Bar in front rack position, feet shoulder-width apart
Slight knee dip, core braced, prepare for explosive drive
Explosive leg drive to initiate bar movement
Press bar overhead in one fluid motion
Land stable with arms locked out overhead
Generate all power from lower body, not arms
Dip-drive-press must be fluid and explosive

main_exercises.name: Medicine Ball Slams
main_exercises.protocol: Maximum explosive force on every rep
main_exercises.tennis_application: Explosive core power for serves and overhead shots

technique_points.instruction: Athletic stance, medicine ball held overhead with both hands
Full body tension, prepare for maximum effort
Slam down with maximum force, full body engagement
Explosive core contraction, entire body involved
Quickly retrieve ball for next repetition
Every rep must be maximum effort, no half measures
Brief reset between reps to maintain power output

main_exercises.name: Farmer's Carry
main_exercises.tennis_application: Grip strength and core stability for racket control

technique_points.instruction: Heavy enough to challenge grip throughout 40 meters
Neutral grip, stable without over-squeezing
Maintain upright posture throughout carry
Core engaged to prevent leaning or compensations
Controlled steps forward, maintain steady pace
Controlled breathing, don't hold breath
Complete full distance maintaining form

conditioning_finisher.title: Reactive Plyometric Development
conditioning_finisher.description: Reactive plyometrics for explosive power development

execution_points.instruction: 12-18 inch box with clear landing area
Step off box (don't jump), maintain readiness
Land and immediately jump up maximally
Minimal ground contact time, less than 0.25 seconds
Maximum vertical jump immediately after landing
Reactive strength, not just jumping ability
Start on one leg, athletic position
Explosive lateral jump to opposite leg
Land on opposite leg, stick the landing
Immediate rebound to other side if doing continuous
Power off outside leg, explosive transitions

recovery_protocol.title: Power Recovery Protocol
recovery_protocol.description: Recovery focused on power training demands

components.name: Active Power Cooldown
components.protocol: Gentle movement transitioning from explosive training

components.name: Power-Specific Stretching
components.protocol: Stretches focused on power training muscle groups

implementation.focus: Hips, posterior chain, shoulders, and core

components.name: Nervous System Recovery
components.protocol: Breathing and relaxation for neuromuscular recovery

implementation.focus: Central nervous system recovery from explosive demands
Recovery optimization for explosive training demands
implementation.progression: Enhanced nutrient timing for power adaptation
